pr_title: moving away from intermediate String in more places and using byte[] instead

timeline.message: moving away from String in more places and using byte[] instead

timeline.bodyText:
Instead of using String "UTF-8", we should use the import -> StandardCharsets.UTF_8
don't need to change on this PR as CI have passed, but please change it in next iteration in another PR.
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText: you are right. will fix. missed this one.

replies.bodyText: will fix in the next PR. thank you
